```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)

enrollment <- read_xlsx("raw-data/class_enrollment_summary_by_term_9.19.19.xlsx", skip = 3)
```

``` {r echo = FALSE}
enrollment %>%
  filter(Course Department = "English") %>%
  arrange(desc(enrollment))
```
